full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO DPAL MO LUGS KYI SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL KLAGS CHOG TU BKOD PA GRU 'DZIN ZHING DU BGROD PA'I THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020A *, ,CES 'PHAGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO DPAL MO LUGS KYI SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL KLAGS CHOG TU BKOD PA GRU 'DZIN ZHING DU BSROD PA'I THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI P'A RIN WANG GI SHOG ,DGE BSKOS SHES RAB RGYA MTSOS BSKUL NGOR, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SNGAGS RAM PA CHOS 'DZIN DAR RGYAS SO,, ,,MANGGA LAm, ,
